message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will bring you great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum of $12000. How about we meet in the middle at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $11000, so how about $10500?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $11250?
I'm getting close to my budget, Alice, but I still need to make a bit more of a concession. How about we meet at $10800? I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $11500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $11750?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Alice. I've made several concessions and I'm still not getting close to your original price. I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $10500? I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand you're getting frustrated, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on getting a good price for the product. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $11250, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?

I'm afraid I'm not willing to budge any further, Alice. I've made it clear that my budget is $10000, and I'm not interested in the extras. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm making one final offer: $10000, take it or leave it.
